Title: Senior Spiritual Consultant & Stand Expert
Description: Provided expert consultation on Stand-related phenomena and supernatural threats. Conducted extensive research on ancient artifacts and mystical powers. Trained new Stand users in combat techniques and ability control. Collaborated with international teams to neutralize dangerous Stand users and protect civilians. Achievements: Successfully eliminated multiple hostile Stand users, contributed to global security operations.

Title: Owner & Master Fortune Teller
Description: Established and operated a successful fortune telling business specializing in tarot readings, spiritual guidance, and mystical consultations. Built a reputation as Cairo's most accurate fortune teller with 95% client satisfaction rate. Services included: tarot card readings, spiritual cleansing, curse removal, and destiny analysis. Managed all business operations including client relations, marketing, and financial management.

Title: Mystical Artifacts Consultant
Description: Consulted on authentication and protection of mystical artifacts with supernatural properties. Conducted risk assessments for cursed objects and provided recommendations for safe handling and storage. Developed protocols for identifying Stand-generating artifacts. Trained museum staff on recognizing and reporting paranormal phenomena.

Title: Apprentice & Spiritual Studies
Description: Intensive spiritual training under master mystics in ancient Egyptian traditions. Studied tarot, astrology, meditation, energy manipulation, and Stand manifestation techniques. Participated in archaeological expeditions to sacred sites. Learned hieroglyphics, ancient rituals, and mystical arts preservation.
